title: Animal Crossing Nintendo Switch Unboxing!
description: PLEASE SUBSCRIBE:  GET MY PINK iJUSTINE CABLES HERE:   GET MY EDITING PLUGIN:    MUSIC I USE -   FRIEND ME HERE:        MY NEW PROJECT:   PODCAST:       WHAT I USE TO MAKE VIDEOS    CAMERAS: Sony a7 IV -  Sony a1 -   Sony a7s III -   Insta 360 ONE X3 -  Insta 360 ONE RS -  Insta 360 GO2 -   LENSES: New Sony GM 24-70mm ii -  Older Sony GM 24-70mm -  New Sony Sony 20-70mm -  Sony GM 16-35mm -  Sony GM 50mm -  Sony GM 135mm -  Sony GM 85mm -   AUDIO:  Sennheiser AVX Digital Wireless -  Sony XLR Adapter -  Sony Hot Shoe Shotgun -  Tiny Sony Microphone -  DJI Mics -  Rode Podcaster Pro II -  Podcaster Mic -  Elgato Wave 3 Mic -   DRONES: DJI Mavic 3 -  DJI Mini 3 -  DJI Air 2S -   LIGHTING: Aputure 600d Pro -  Aputure Light Dome II -  Aputure Amaran 200d -  Aputure 35in Light Dome -  Aputure Lantern Softbox -   Sony CF Express A 160g + Card Reader-  Sony CF Express A 800g -     These links are affiliate and by using them youre helping out my channel! Thank you!     BECOME A CHANNEL MEMBER:
transcript: - Hey guys, it's Justine, and today I'm unboxing the new Animal Crossing Nintendo Switch. I'm honestly really excited about this, but I initially, when this was first released, I told myself, Justine, you don't need this, don't get it, don't buy it. So I missed the preorder deadline. And then as the time was nearing, I got got FOMO and I went on eBay and I did some things. And that's where we are today. This is one of my favorite games, it is so much fun, so the fact that I was gonna pass on this incredible Nintendo Switch, I'm not really sure what I was thinking, I think I was trying to be a responsible adult, and then I remembered, you're not, Justine. You're not a responsible adult at all. I know there's been a lot of delays in other countries because of all the things that are happening right now so hopefully some of you guys who did order this will get it within a reasonable timeframe. But if not, I feel like a lot of you guys already do have Switches, so thankfully, well, it's actually not thankfully, the game doesn't actually even come with this console, so if you did happen to order this and you already do have a Nintendo Switch, you can still play it. But I think one of the things that is up in the air is how will you be able to transfer your island to another Nintendo Switch. I think eventually that is something that obviously Nintendo is gonna have to address. Depending upon when you're watching this video, maybe they already addressed it, but from what I saw online right now, they haven't yet. Either way, I'm very excited about this, this comes out on my birthday, on March 20th, and it's crazy 'cause I feel like the last several years, video games have come out on my birthday, so it really is one of the best gifts.
